data.lyric:
[ti:CAROUSEL (Explicit)]
[ar:Travis Scott]
[al:ASTROWORLD (Explicit)]

[00:00.00]CAROUSEL (Explicit) - Travis Scott
[00:00.06]Lyricist：Jacques Webster/Christopher Breaux/Chauncey Hollis
[00:00.13]Composer：Jacques Webster/Christopher Breaux/Chauncey Hollis
[00:00.19]What's crackin'
[00:00.88]You already know who it is
[00:01.83]Ya boy Big Tuck
[00:03.11]Freight Train Tuck
[00:04.64]Astroworld is now in session ya understand
[00:07.04]I'm the dean of this here
[00:08.31]I got this
[00:09.07]Travis Scott：
[00:41.08]Yeah yeah
[00:42.66]Parked at the Days Inn ain't takin' no days in yeah
[00:46.05]Don't need a vacation I need a replacement alright
[00:49.62]Bustin' the lights out soon as we came in it's lit
[00:52.94]What're they talkin' about what's it pertainin' yeah yeah
[00:56.52]Need me a therapist to ask if I'm aging yeah
[00:59.21]This M-E-D it feel caved in yeah
[01:00.86]All of my demons invadin'
[01:02.25]I live paranoid hesitatin'
[01:04.08]They bitin' they bitin' the cadence skrt skrt
[01:05.99]Go out their way it's okay
[01:07.41]Just lock the doors at the basement
[01:09.20]I got a gate with my face in it
[01:10.94]Frank Ocean：
[01:11.42]Brand new brand new this new place I got to
[01:14.95]New world new sky that's so blue it's black too
[01:18.31]New growth new growth all these fades I outgrew
[01:21.73]Blue bands blue bands get my cash from drive-thru
[01:24.73]Boy you're too flash too flash keep the flash minimal
[01:28.24]B**ch I'm too cold too cold see my breath visible
[01:31.06]Travis Scott：
[01:31.50]Yeah
[01:32.40]Icy cold it is so it is so icy cold yeah
[01:35.73]Mixing the water with cheese is making the money get mold yeah
[01:39.29]Trying to be like gang you better go get it in Vogue yeah
[01:42.58]Put 84's on lanes I ride by you think it is spokes spokes
[01:47.29]We did it we said it we spoke spoke yeah
[01:50.43]We put it out thought it was smoke this 504 uh
[01:53.79]This is at home right down the street from Alamo
[01:56.23]Frank Ocean/Travis Scott：
[01:57.05]Moving in silence don't mean it's movin' slow
[01:59.04]Even though the speed got old
[02:03.70]Sprinkling methamphetamines
[02:04.69]On the leaves like the snow
[02:07.73]Bet they soak
[02:09.01]I'm a new species tail swings on the road
[02:11.93]Come to reach and lose both
[02:13.65]Got springs like a toad
[02:15.21]Some for free in the tote
[02:16.83]Saké drown like round white diamonds
[02:19.17]Carats yah
[02:20.53]Copy sound might got two wings parrot alright
[02:23.79]Landing down wind caught two wings it's lit
[02:27.32]Talons scrape hit the stage two wings yeah yeah
[02:30.82]Better pray better pray two wings straight up
[02:33.08]Frank Ocean：
[02:33.65]Brand new brand new this new place I got to
[02:37.20]New world new sky that's so blue it's black too
[02:40.53]New growth new growth all these fades I outgrew
[02:44.02]Blue bands blue bands get my cash from drive-thru
[02:46.90]Boy you're too flash too flash keep the flash minimal
[02:50.49]B**ch I'm too cold too cold see my breath visible
data.trans:
[ti:CAROUSEL (Explicit)]
[ar:Travis Scott]
[al:ASTROWORLD (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]以下歌词翻译由微信翻译提供
[00:00.06]//
[00:00.13]//
[00:00.19]怎么回事
[00:00.88]你已经知道是谁了
[00:01.83]你的兄弟无人匹敌
[00:03.11]开着货运列车
[00:04.64]星际世界已经开始了你明白吗
[00:07.04]我是这里的院长
[00:08.31]我可以的
[00:09.07]特拉维斯斯科特：
[00:41.08]//
[00:42.66]把车停在酒店里一天也不休息
[00:46.05]我不需要休假我需要一个替代者
[00:49.62]我们一进来就把灯灭了气氛热烈
[00:52.94]他们在说什么未来会怎样
[00:56.52]我需要心理医生帮我问问我是否衰老了
[00:59.21]这首歌让我感觉支离破碎
[01:00.86]我的心魔都在侵袭
[01:02.25]我疑神疑鬼犹豫不决
[01:04.08]他们激情飞扬他们激情四射
[01:05.99]走他们的路没事的
[01:07.41]锁好地下室的门
[01:09.20]我的脸贴着大门
[01:10.94]弗兰克·欧森：
[01:11.42]我要去一个全新的地方
[01:14.95]新的世界新的天空湛蓝无比也漆黑一片
[01:18.31]新的成长我已经超越了所有的挫折
[01:21.73]百元大钞我在免下车餐厅挣大钱
[01:24.73]男孩你太耀眼太耀眼不要太闪耀
[01:28.24]碧池我冷血无情我的呼吸清晰可见
[01:31.06]特拉维斯斯科特：
[01:31.50]//
[01:32.40]如此冰冷如此冰冷
[01:35.73]把水和奶酪混在一起就能挣到盆满钵满
[01:39.29]想要成为一个匪帮你最好上《Vogue》
[01:42.58]我开着0.84口径的枪在路上飞驰你以为我无人匹敌
[01:47.29]我们做到了我们说过了我们畅所欲言
[01:50.43]我们把烟灭了还以为抽了烟
[01:53.79]就在阿拉莫大街那头的家里
[01:56.23]弗兰克海洋/特拉维斯斯科特：
[01:57.05]悄无声息地行动并不意味着行动缓慢
[01:59.04]即使速度停滞不前
[02:03.70]四处撒那种东西
[02:04.69]落在树叶上就像落在雪里
[02:07.73]我打赌他们都湿透了
[02:09.01]我是一个新物种尾巴在路上摇摆
[02:11.93]我终于如愿以偿却又两败俱伤
[02:13.65]弹簧就像蛤蟆
[02:15.21]有些东西装在袋子里是免费的
[02:16.83]Saké就像一颗颗白色的钻石
[02:19.17]Carats yah
[02:20.53]抄袭的声音可能会有两翼鹦鹉好吧
[02:23.79]降落时微风吹拂着我的双翼
[02:27.32]伸出利爪登上舞台张开翅膀
[02:30.82]最好祈祷最好祈祷张开翅膀
[02:33.08]弗兰克·欧森：
[02:33.65]我要去一个全新的地方
[02:37.20]新的世界新的天空湛蓝无比也漆黑一片
[02:40.53]新的成长我已经超越了所有的挫折
[02:44.02]百元大钞我在免下车餐厅挣大钱
[02:46.90]男孩你太耀眼太耀眼不要太闪耀
[02:50.49]碧池我冷血无情我的呼吸清晰可见
